  "patch": "@@ -4,10 +4,18 @@ description: Places Administrator\n ms.service: entra-id\n ms.subservice: role-based-access-control\n ms.topic: include\n-ms.date: 08/12/2025\n+ms.date: 09/01/2025\n ms.custom: include file\n ---\n \n+Assign the Places Administrator role to users who need to do the following tasks:\n+\n+- Manage all aspects of the Microsoft Places service\n+- Configure and manage buildings, floors, rooms, and desks\n+- Oversee and manage associated booking policies\n+\n+[Learn more](/microsoft-365/places/configure-admin-roles)\n+\n <!-- autogenerated content starts here -->\n \n > [!div class=\"mx-tableFixed\"]"

ai_summary.Response: This commit updates the documentation for the Places Administrator role. The changes clarify the role's responsibilities, including managing the Microsoft Places service, configuring buildings, floors, rooms, and desks, and overseeing booking policies. The update also includes a link to learn more about configuring admin roles for Microsoft Places.
